website_summaries.verdict: One of the top sellers in the category, this is a good smoker box that gets the job done.
pros: This smoker box is sturdy and works well on a gas-powered barbecue grill
It heats up fairly quickly and produces good, lasting smoke
It even works well on an electric grill
cons: This smoker box tends to warp and rust fairly quickly
It's also on the small side, which means it won't hold too many wood chips at a time

customer_reviews.title: Almost too good to be true. But it's true!
customer_reviews.text: I have too many words bouncing around my head to explain how much I love this thing, but I'll try to keep it simple. This thing works. And it works very well. It is EXTREMELY well built, and I know it will last for a long time. It's not often that you can say something like that about an item you put in a flame in order to create smoke. But this has totally transformed the grilling experience. My family loves it and it just really makes cooking out more enjoyable. The flavor added is amazing. Just make sure you buy the right wood chips. If you enjoy smoked food, you just can not go wrong buying this box.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful little guy! I had been just using some foil packs and loved the concept, but they didn't create a lot of smoke. This worked great and smoked some ribs up wonderfully. Love the hinged lid, easy to open an add a few more. Would recommend this for anyone who loves the grill and some good smoked flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Sue J.

customer_reviews.title: This box is ok, gets really charred and is ...
customer_reviews.text: This box is ok, gets really charred and is now all black due to the heat. After only a couple of months now lid is hard to open and close, I believe due to the fact that heat is warping it. Would not buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: BonkersTheCat

customer_reviews.title: Great results on Weber Genesis 310 series Gas Grill!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderfully durable smoker box! It gave our wood chips a nice, even burn. And the clean-up was easy. While they suggest in the instructions to put the chips in dry, we followed the chip vendor's (Cameron's) direction of soaking. (Looking forward to experimenting with the dry chip method this weekend!) Having used other smoker boxes, this has been by far the best for getting a nice even flow of smoke throughout the grill. This was used on a Weber Genesis 310 series gas grill.
customer_reviews.author: JenCanCook

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting food with this smoker box
customer_reviews.text: This smoker box performed very well in my gas grill. Just smoked some turkey cutlets with maple wood and they came out great. I'm looking forward to trying other woods with this smoker box from Grillaholics. Definite thumbs up!! The box is well constructed and the lid opens easily.
customer_reviews.author: AWJ00

customer_reviews.title: Meh.  Won't turn your grill into a smoker but it does work
customer_reviews.text: Solid device and good quality. Takes a long time, and a lot of heat, to get it to start smoking which is a problem. It does generate smoke and you can smell the flavor, but it doesn't add much to the food. It just dusts your food with smoke wood flavor. Having had a real lump charcoal smoker in the past that I used with favor woods, this is no comparison. The problem is that most grills aren't designed to trap and hold the smoke like a smoker does, so most of it just blows out the edges & back of the grill.
customer_reviews.author: R. EARLS

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Weber Spirit grills.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because I wanted to get some smoke flavor into foods I cook on my Weber Spirit E-330 gas grill. Out of the box it seems pretty sturdy and well made, and holds a decent amount of wood chips. Unfortunately, it doesn’t work at all with my grill. It doesn’t get hot enough to smolder the wood chips when sitting on top of the cooking grates, even with the grill cranked to high and the sear grate on. And it’s too tall to fit underneath the grates on top of the flavorizer bars.
customer_reviews.author: A. Meier

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tool
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift for my father, who loves grilling. He was so excited that he ended up using it within thirty minutes of opening the gift. The result was the most delicious chicken we’d tasted. He’s looking forward to trying it out with other meats and other varieties of wood chips. This is a great product that I’d recommend to anyone who’s looking for a new way to grill. Super easy to use, and made well.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Elbourn

customer_reviews.title: This Grillbox works well and adds that smokey flavor we all love!
customer_reviews.text: I found that it was a little awkward finding a place to sit it in our particular type grill because of the design around the flame area so it has to be set on the rack, which takes up room that can’t be used for cooking food (we have a Brinkman grill). However, that being said, it works and adds that smokey flavor, and is simple enough to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Carousel

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The box appears to be sturdy and well made. The only problem I have is, I can't lay the box directly on top of the flavorizer bars on my Weber grill as it's just a little too high so the grates rest on it instead of the grill itself. I either have to angle it between the flavorizer bars or just lay it on top of the grates. Other than that, it seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: G. N.

customer_reviews.title: warped after first use
customer_reviews.text: Mine warped the first time I used it. Now when I try and use it, the inside chips burn immediately into a flame. No more smoke! This is because after being warped it can't close and the flames connect to the wood and burn the chips. This is a complete failure for me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: After using a couple times it warped so bad the lid wont close but if it does then ...
customer_reviews.text: After using a couple times it warped so bad the lid wont close but if it does then it wont open but use pliers to bend the edges and it will open and close
customer_reviews.author: Dallascowboysfan

customer_reviews.title: Great product...
customer_reviews.text: This smoker box works great. I smoked a brisket with this box on my grill it was very tasty. I used Jack Daniels chips. Bought one for my son...
customer_reviews.author: High Pockets

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy smoker box
customer_reviews.text: The smoker box is well constructed. Directions come with it for those who are not familiar with smoker boxes. It came quickly as promised and was as described in the online catalogue. I would highly recommend for anyone who wants to smoke on their grill.
customer_reviews.author: J. Haton

customer_reviews.title: Works great and I am glad I reached out to cave ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I am glad I reached out to cave tools to see if I needed this or the smaller one. I was able to fit this larger model and the smoke generally last through a regular grilling session. So far no warping issues of any sort after 6 uses. Nice heavy weight construction and the hing works smoothly. The top closes well also.
customer_reviews.author: White

customer_reviews.title: Only ok
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. Out $40 bucks, and he doesn’t even use them. They don’t produce near as much smoke as just loosely wrapping chips in tin foil with holes. But these boxes are easier to use and reusable.
customer_reviews.author: PageDR6

customer_reviews.title: impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting the quality and thickness of product that arrived. I purchased as a lighting deal. I would buy this again in a few years if needed to replace.
customer_reviews.author: TRUMP.is.your.PRESIDENT

customer_reviews.title: Grillaholic, why not Lil smoke box?
customer_reviews.text: There is no big deal about a stainless box with an open-ended hinge. It is overpriced if you ask me. I hope it delivers smoke on my gas grill. Flavor?? Easy of Use?? Sturdiness?? Why wouldn't it be easy to use and sturdy? As far as flavor, what would I compare it to? The only suggestion I would have is to change the name... Quit sending me review notices. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to smoking and I was skeptical that this little box would do the trick but it does and it does it very well. I’ve used it twice now and I’m getting the hang for how much wood chips I need and how much flame it needs to start and maintain a good smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Coastal

customer_reviews.title: Low grade stainless steel.
customer_reviews.text: Katie from Grillaholic's reached out and is correcting the problem I was having. Bumping this up to 4 stars for their attention to customer service and sincere desire to make me a happy customer. -j Topic: Smoker Box rust
customer_reviews.author: Jay Westmark

customer_reviews.title: quality of framing of the metal
customer_reviews.text: the hinged lid pivots freely, even after excess heat could cause some twisting on normal lighter metals. over all it work great in small to normal grills.
customer_reviews.author: harland l

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I was always told that grilling was a “man’s job”, but this summer I have discovered a passion for grilling and that grilling really is a great excuse to hang out and drink a cold one outside. The smoke box definitely upped my game, and my husband claims he has lost his man card because I can officially grill better than him. Thanks for helping me one-up my husband!
customer_reviews.author: Emily N Birk

customer_reviews.title: Tried that and it worked excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use this box in my Weber gas grill and didn’t meet my expectations. I think the steel might be a little too thick, tried to put it on top of the grates and didn’t produce enough smoke. Tried to put it on top of my flavorizer bars under the grated and chips caught fire every time due to the holes in the side. My suggestion would be to just use a Weber foil grease tray with chips in it and wrap in foil and poke holes in it. Tried that and it worked excellent.
customer_reviews.author: jonathon taylor

customer_reviews.title: I am trying out the smoker box with my charcoal grill with lid
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Charcoal smoker. It doesn't work as good and doesn't get enough oxygen into the basket but keeps the wood chips in place. Still, it gets the job done. My grill is not green egg. My grill is called PK Grill. I am waiting for the rain to stop and backyard cleared so it's code compliant with city inspectors.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Knight

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for Kettle smoking !
customer_reviews.text: I use a Weber Kettle for everything. Previously I used hickory, mesquite or apple CHUNKS. Tried the box on Kingsford charcoal , followed instructions and it worked perfectly to smoke a slab of ribs !
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: returned - ordered a cast iron version from Home Depot
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan L. Levine

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Smoker Box!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for grilling with wood chips!! Easy to use and easy to clean. We love this product and use it frequently when we grill!
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: The flavor
customer_reviews.text: I got a gas grill as a gift. I usually bbq with charcoal but the smoker box adds the flavor I need. It is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Carl G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design from an excellent company
customer_reviews.text: Grillaholics - you guys n girls do it right. Easy to use and invaluable for great grill smoking flavor. Works great with my Weber Electric Grille.
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Let's a lot of flavor out just wish it was slightly bigger. Its very sturdy and easy to fill and utilize
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Didn't make much smoke
customer_reviews.text: Followed directions and put below grill; then tried again above the brill; followed directions and used dry chips (caught on fire) and then used moist chips. It's as good as most smokers of this type, and appears to be sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Horn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and the holes on the side provides a lot smoke to escape the box. Works great would order another.
customer_reviews.author: AAM

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with temperature
customer_reviews.text: This started to deform at a much lower temperature than I expected. I was smoking chicken at 275ish and the next time I took this out it wouldn't shut correctly because it had flexed. Other than that the thing worked fine. I've moved onto using chunks and find them preferable so I haven't used this in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Rush E Elkins

customer_reviews.title: Very well made box.
customer_reviews.text: Only used this smoker box once. Didn't have much luck on my gas Weber Grill. Used soaked wood chips and placed the box right on the flavor bars. Next thing I knew was all the wood chips were on fire. Then I removed the box and used dry chips (recommended) and placed it right on the grate. Very little smoke was produced. I gave up but will try again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Ron H.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Works great on our propane grill- no room to have propane and a smoker- great substitute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gas grill with wood smoke flavor
customer_reviews.text: I really like this smoker box. It is sturdy and holds a good amount of wood chips. Great flavor on our BBQ Chicken. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Trisen

customer_reviews.title: No mess, works good.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first attempt at smoking brisket, so I needed all the help I could get. This smoker box was great and made it easy for cleanup. There's not too much to it, put the wood chips in it, close the cover and put it in the smoker but simplicity is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: The box is small so filled with chips it lasts about an hour..however its also easy to fit in the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Made my gas grill into a “Green Egg”
customer_reviews.text: Have tried other smoker boxes in the past on my gas grill without success! Received the Grillaholics box, put it to immediate test last night. It was awesome! My neighbor immediately came over and asked if I had gotten a Green Egg!
customer_reviews.author: Rep2413

customer_reviews.title: Geeat little bos
customer_reviews.text: Love this box!! Bullet proof and so easy to use!! Great for gass grills as well as charcoal
customer_reviews.author: William J Defayette

customer_reviews.title: Not a great grill, but great smoker box!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used the smoker box, it didn't smoke as much as I wanted. That's mostly due to the grill I'm using though. The second time, I repositioned it and it really threw out the smoke! Great alternative to paying hundreds of dollars on a smoker. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This is a great smoker box. It's well made and very easy to use. It has a good amount of volume to keep the smoker chips burning.
customer_reviews.author: John Wolcott

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Did not want to buy a regular smoker, so this came in handy
customer_reviews.author: sharon vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Smoke ‘em if you got ‘em
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had the chance to use this a couple of times, but I like it so far. The first time that I used it the wood chips burned up incredibly quick, so instead of using the chips dry, as recommended, I opted to soak the chips anyways. Now with a nice 50/50 mix of wet and dry chips, I get quick smoke that remains constant from start to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Never seems to get hot enough to produce smoke. ...
customer_reviews.text: Never seems to get hot enough to produce smoke. I think I will use my aluminum foil packets in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy to be able to add a smoke flavor to my grilled food. Easy to coean and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Gail P Burton

customer_reviews.title: get that smoke in your meats!
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use, and lets you get smoky flavor all up in your meats!
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as a real smoker
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as a real smoker, but it does a good job. I set this up on one side of my portable bbq, with flames up high to get it really smoking, then set the meat on the opposite side with no flame, and the mest ends up with caramel-smoked outside and fully cooked inside within 45 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The smoker box worked just fine in both my gas grill and Weber kettle. I smoked some sockeye salmon and it turned out perfect on the gas grill. I am very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: bluegoose

customer_reviews.title: ... adds just the right amount of smoke flavor I like, it is easy to use and clean up
customer_reviews.text: I use this with an out door kitchen and find that it adds just the right amount of smoke flavor I like, it is easy to use and clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Merchant

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker box! Did our Thanksgiving Turkey with it. YUM!!
customer_reviews.author: Itsleah

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and worked great! Would recommend for anyone wanting to try smoking without a true smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Kaochoy Saechao

customer_reviews.title: Great smoke box for Weber Genesis
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly between grates and flame shields on Weber Genesis II. Great accessory
customer_reviews.author: FS Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great way to add flavor to your grilling!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Grillaholics Smoker Box to add extra flavor to my grill. The perfect way to add extra flavor to your gas grill. Just add your favorite scented chips to this sturdy box and you're all set. Box is well made and couldn't be simpler to use. Love mine!!
customer_reviews.author: Greg  Beebe

customer_reviews.title: Nice little smoke box
customer_reviews.text: Took this little smoke box camping for 3 days. It's slightly too large to use on a Smokey Joe grill if you want to do indirect low and slow cooking. But it will provide a fantastic "smoked flavor" too chicken wings and pork chops while just grilling the meat
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Beale

customer_reviews.title: Looks great built well
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and feels sturdy. Haven’t had long enough to know but seems like it will be 5 stars after some use. Look forward to continuously using every time I grill.
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We used it for the first time to make a small brisket, it was great! Easy to use, I also bought the gloves which were also wonderful! I didn’t realize the box was so little, but when we used it, it was the perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Carol W

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking; shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift so won't be able to say how it works.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Smoker Box
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband and he loved it! Perfect for a “just because I love u “gift or for someone hard to buy for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.  Adds great smoked flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I have received the box and I absolutely love it. I’ve become a little obsessed with smoking! Although I love to cook and we grill often I had never attempted to smoke anything. We have already used it five times in the week and a 1⁄2 we have had it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good grilling accessory
customer_reviews.text: Item came quickly and as advertised. It’s a Christmas gift so it has not been used yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks well made
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet, but it is Heavy Duty and I like overkill!
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Works much better than the cast iron one I was using because ...
customer_reviews.text: Works much better than the cast iron one I was using because it doesn't catch fire and burn the meat.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: The option of smoking via our grill makes this one of the best purchases we’ve ever made. We smoked ribs a few days ago and are so excited for our next smoking adventure! The smell and flavor were mouth watering. Super easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wittman

customer_reviews.title: Works great !
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my gas grill . Puts off great smoke flavor and box is built well.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Smokin'!
customer_reviews.text: Love what this does on the grill! We bought chips too and this adds so much flavor and no extra calories!
customer_reviews.author: Beth A

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy, well built and plenty of smoke was produced
customer_reviews.text: Used the firebox with hickory chips on a Weber Genesis 3 burner gas grill for the first time today to smoke a whole beer can chicken. . The box worked perfectly. It is sturdy, well built and plenty of smoke was produced. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sam_Adams

customer_reviews.title: Smoky Flavor Without The Mess
customer_reviews.text: Works fairly well. Gives food cooked on a gas grill more flavor. I will continue to use it each time I grill. It takes up minimal room on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: B. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed. It worked great and produced tremendous smoke flavor ...
customer_reviews.text: After only 1 times using this box( at low temps 250 or less) it has warped. Highly disappointed. It worked great and produced tremendous smoke flavor but the short life of the box itself lead to the low rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 I recommend
customer_reviews.text: I never give a product 5 stars. That doesn't mean it isn't phenomenal! I love this smoker box. It's especially useful when I live in a place where you're not allowed to use charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for gas/charcoal grills or smokers
customer_reviews.text: Works great in our grill/smoker. Holds quite a bit of chips
customer_reviews.author: lori costa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made, awesome tastes.
customer_reviews.text: This makes all my bbq-ing freeking delicious. My grilling game just stepped up to a professional level.
customer_reviews.author: the big kahuna

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to get it hot enough to smoke
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to get it hot enough to smoke during regular cooking time.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Mc

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: WORKS GOOD, MEDEL THIN WE WILL SEE HOW LONG IT LAST.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great for gas grill
customer_reviews.text: I soak the wood chips prior to use, I also drilled holes out in the bottom and it has help provide longer and quality smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great BBQ gadget
customer_reviews.text: Great BBQ tool that gives extra flavor especially when using a gas grill. Smoker box is easy to use and does exactly what it is supposed to. Smoke at times is so thick that you will have to take a step back because it works so well!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H.

customer_reviews.title: No Soaking Necessary
customer_reviews.text: Well made! No need to soak the wood chips first so you can decide at the last minute to use it. Very tasty results. Will get a great deal of use out of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Earle Grossman

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR!
customer_reviews.text: A quality item for sure. Works very well and is backed by very good customer service. AAA+
customer_reviews.author: rockhound45

customer_reviews.title: Adds great smoke flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Used this in my Weber charcoal grill for a wild turkey breast and it turned out excellent! Easy to use, just fill box with wood chips and put on top of hot charcoals. You get about 15 - 20 min. of smoke but that's all you need.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Meh... didn't really hold up well. I think their construction is substandard
customer_reviews.author: Anitha Umapathy

customer_reviews.title: He loved it used it right away
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, he is obsessed with grilling. He loved it used it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty product.
customer_reviews.text: Its very heavy, I was surprised at how well made it was.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Winchester

customer_reviews.title: SMOKIN!
customer_reviews.text: I use this with Weber kettle and fill with soaked chips. Placed directly on coals.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works well As described , a very sturdy built smoker
customer_reviews.author: Cnctrman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice heavy duty box
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heavy duty box. Lid works very well to add additional wood chips. I used water soaked apple chips and placed the box on top of the flavorizer bars on my Weber Gas Grill. Turned all burners to high and had smoke in 25-30 minutes. Worked great. Great customer service communication.
customer_reviews.author: Ron M.

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Product performed as advertised. I needed to have a versatile smoker box to use between three different appliances. Worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and super easy to make the perfect smoked meat, fish and even a grilled cheese sandwich!
customer_reviews.author: Teeb

customer_reviews.title: It's sssmokin'!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this smoker box for several months now. The quality is very good - the lid opens and closes very nicely. I used it for the first time on my favorite wings recipe and it gave them a very nice smokey flavor. I apologize for the terrible headline.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Porodust is very sturdy. Well made and works well on my grill. Had to place box over flame tamers to get good smoke. Would not smoke well on grill racks.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Breighner

customer_reviews.title: Change the chips after each use
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use adds a great flavor to anything you are grilling
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Kamp

customer_reviews.title: I can see where it will be very useful to the person receiving it
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Christmas gift so I have not nor will I use it. However, I can see where it will be very useful to the person receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Christ

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This box appears to be sturdy and built to last. Performs just as expected. I have no hesitation in recommending this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he is obsessed! It's easy and fun to use, easy to clean and so far everything we've cooked is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Smoky flavor from any BBQ
customer_reviews.text: It is a Christmas gift and I believe he will love it
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Smoking
customer_reviews.text: Great box. Used it the first time on the 4th. And it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works great on the Big Green Egg! Well-made and believe it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Keb

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great to get that smoke flavor and smell from using ur gas grill. Put a few chips in everytime I grill. Holds up quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker Box - TX
customer_reviews.text: The smoker box is well made and works great. I am very satisfied with my purchase and will keep Grillaholics on my short list for all my grilling needs. Keep up the great work and thanks for great products.
customer_reviews.author: martin guerra

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: lid warped after 1st use, and was hard to open when refilling during long smoke times
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice heavy duty box. It is just what I need.
customer_reviews.author: W. Adcock

product_meta.title: Grillaholics Smoker Box, Top Meat Smokers Box in Barbecue Grilling Accessories, Add Smokey BBQ Flavor on Gas Grill or Charcoal Grills with This Stainless Steel Wood Chip Smoker Box
feature_bullets: TURN YOUR GAS OR CHARCOAL GRILL INTO A SMOKER. Just add the wood chips of your choice to our Heavy Duty Smoker Box, and place directly over the flame. You’ll be smoking in no time with no need for an expensive electric smoker.
MADE FROM EXTRA THICK STAMPED STAINLESS STEEL. Many cheaper made smoker boxes warp from the heat of your grill’s flame. That’s why we made sure the Grillaholics smoking box won’t.
HINGED LID FOR EASY ACCESS. Just pop it open (we’d suggest using a pair of our grill gloves for this) to add more chips and you’ll be back smoking in no time.
LARGE CAPACITY. Our large capacity wood chip smoker box means you’ll spend less time refilling wood chips, and more time hanging out with friends and family.

THE GRILLAHOLICS PROMISE. If at any point you are unhappy with your smoker box you can return it for a full money back refund or replacement. Our customers are the reason our small, family owned business is in business, so we do whatever we can to make sure you’re satisfied with your purchase.
